channel.title: MovieLens on Jialuo Liu
channel.description: Recent content in MovieLens on Jialuo Liu

item.title: Movie Recommendation Engine using Spark
item.description: In this post, I will use Apache Spark and MLlib (Spark machine learning library) to build a movie recommender system. Prerequisite: Install PySpark on MacOS The results are based on Python 3.7 with Spark 2.4. Datasets: from Movielens Full data set (24 million ratings, 40,000 movies, 250,000 users). A smaller data set (100836 ratings, 3683 tag application across 9742 movies, 610 users, 1996⁄03-2018⁄09) Each user rated at least 20 movies, unique user-id.
